title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 294/96 of 15 February 1996 amending Regulation (EC) No 1489/95 setting export refunds on fruit and vegetables
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 294/96 of 15 February 1996 amending Regulation (EC) No 1489/95 setting export refunds on fruit and vegetables
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Annexes I and II to Regulation (EC) No 1489/95 are hereby replaced by Annexes I and II respectively to this Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the third day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 15 February 1996.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 118, 20. 5. 1972, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 132, 16. 6. 1995, p. 8.
(3) OJ No L 145, 29. 6. 1995, p. 75.
(4) OJ No L 314, 28. 12. 1995, p. 65.
(5) OJ No L 145, 29. 6. 1995, p. 68.
(6) OJ No L 280, 23. 11. 1995, p. 30.
